sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of the Meadowlark Act:(1) Contribution means a donation which is made for the purpose of providing a source of funding for the Meadowlark Program established in section 85-2804;(2) Eligible postsecondary educational institution has the same meaning as in section 77-1416;(
sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of the Meadowlark Act:(1) Contribution means a donation which is made for the purpose of providing a source of funding for the Meadowlark Program established in section 85-2804;(2) Eligible postsecondary educational institution has the same meaning as in section 77-1416;(3) Nebraska educational savings plan trust has the same meaning as in section 77-1416;(4) Qualified education expenses has the same meaning as in section 77-1416; and(5) Qualified individual means an individual born on or after January 1, 2020, who is a resident of this state at the time of birth.SourceLaws 2019, LB610, ยง 2;Laws 2020, LB1042, ยง 6;Laws 2021, LB528, ยง 66;Laws 2025, LB647, ยง 56.Operative Date: October 1, 2025
